params.newPrice: New price of Bond token of USD (6 decimal)

params.recipient: Address of recipient for withdraw current cumulative balance.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

priceABT(address,uint256).details: Get ABT token price from payment token amount.

priceBond(address,uint256).details: Get Bond token price from payment token amount.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allowToken(address,string).notice: Add token to tokens white list.

buyABT(address,uint256).notice: Buy ABT token with ERC20 payment token amount.

buyABTFromETH().notice: Buy ABT token with ETH amount.

buyBond(address,uint256).notice: Buy Bond token with ERC20 payment token amount.

buyBondFromETH().notice: Buy Bond token with ETH amount.

denyToken(address).notice: Remove token from tokens white list.
